snippet: Since losing financial support from its publisher in 2009, the Southern lifestyle magazine Garden & Gun has made an impressive recovery, adding more than 20,000 subscribers in 2011.
abstract: Southern lifestyle magazine Garden & Gun has made an impressive recovery since losing financial support from its publisher in 2009; its contrarian approach may be paying off, given that it has added more than 20,000 subscribers in 2011, to 237,837, and could be profitable for the first time in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Since losing financial support from its publisher in 2009, the Southern lifestyle magazine Garden & Gun has made an impressive recovery, adding more than 20,000 subscribers in 2011.

headline.seo: Garden & Gun Magazine Survives in an Ailing Industry
headline.main: Garden & Gun Claws Its Way Back From the Brink
headline.print_headline: A ‘Love Song to the South’ Claws Its Way Back From the Brink
